div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 94px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 31px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 170px; max-width: 205px; width: 205px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: Hello World bundle.js is 1.9MB uncompressed and 383KB gzipped.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 150px; max-width: 205px; width: 205px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: Fat JAR for Desktop with proguard

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 52px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 52px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 170px; max-width: 205px; width: 205px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: Full .app bundle without dependencies for macOS is just 14.5MB or 3.1MB gzipped.
Window, Linux and iOS have similar sizes

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 150px; max-width: 205px; width: 205px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: The Hello World apk is just 4.6MB
It contains only DEX without per architecture native dependencies
